mapper.select: SELECT PROF_NO, PROF_NM, PROF_GENDER , PROF_PROFILE, PROF_COUNTRY, PROF_ADDR , PROF_TEL, PROF_EMAIL, PROF_JOIN_DT , PROF_STATUS, PROF_MAJ_CD, PROF_PW FROM PROFESSOR
SELECT PROF_NO, PROF_NM, PROF_GENDER , PROF_PROFILE, PROF_COUNTRY, PROF_ADDR , PROF_TEL, PROF_EMAIL, PROF_JOIN_DT , PROF_STATUS, PROF_MAJ_CD, PROF_PW FROM PROFESSOR WHERE PROF_NO = #{profNo}
